dl_writer.h File Reference

Defines conversation bar class interfaces. More...

Go to the source code of this file.

Compounds

class  DL_Writer
 Defines interface for writing low level DXF constructs to a file; implementation is defined in derived classes that write to binary or ASCII files.
Implements functions that write higher level constructs in terms of the low level ones. More...


Defines

#define DL_WRITER_H
 If DL_WRITER_H is defined, dl_writer.h has already been included and it will not be processed again.
If DL_WRITER_H is undefined, it will be defined and dl_writer.h will be included.

Detailed Description

Defines conversation bar class interfaces.
